name: book-search-engine
description: A refactored full stack application using the MERN stack together with GraphQL in order to allow authenticated users to search for books and saving data (including their cover images) about them.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Jonathan Maldonado Guemarez(refactoring), Xandromus(source code)
